title: The Private Life of Mr. & Mrs. M

sources.title: The Private Life Of Mr. & Mrs. M
sources.description: Unlike the common cultural traditions in Iran Mohsen Mr. M. has decided his life to the new developments. In this way the traditional appearance of the first action, the wife is a modern woman. This underlying conflict is different, that M. did not tolerate it.

metadata.Plot: Mohsen is improving his business life to higher levels, but when his wife gets involved in the business, he finds it difficult to tolerate the underlying conflicts.
metadata.Actors: Hamid Farrokhnezhad, Yoosef Ghorbani, Ebrahim Hatamikia
